title: Emerald and Diamond Grand Haaram - A Verdant Legacy
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (D.wt:-4.80). Features a meticulous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This opulent Haaram features a graduating design with floral motifs meticulously crafted in gold. Alternating round and pear-shaped Emeralds are accented by dazzling diamond clusters, creating a harmonious blend of color and light. The cascading teardrop Emerald pendants further enhance its majestic appeal. Intricate filigree detailing adorns the gold framework.
colors: Lush Emerald Green and dazzling White Diamonds set against the rich Yellow Gold
creating a classic and timeless color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి)
and other significant celebrations where making a statement is desired. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for high-profile modern events.
description: This Grand Haaram is an heirloom piece, embodying the opulence and tradition of South Indian jewelry. The combination of precious emeralds and brilliant diamonds radiates sophistication. The impeccable craftsmanship and timeless design make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, promising enduring beauty and lasting value.
